original_text: But I tell you that Elijah has come, and they did to him whatever they pleased, as it is written of him.”
korean_text: 그러나 내가 너희에게 이르노니 엘리야가 왔으되 기록된 바와 같이 사람들이 함부로 대우하였느니라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: and they did to him whatever they pleased
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그들이 그에게 하고 싶은 대로 다 했다

sentences.original_text: as it is written of him
